mapper.update:
UPDATE tty_po_diary_delegation set
MANDATOR_ID = #{mandatorId},
MANDATARY_ID = #{mandataryId},
DIARY_ID = #{diaryId},
WEIGHT = #{weight},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag},
CREATE_USER = #{createUser},
CREATE_USER_DEPT = #{createUserDept},
CREATE_USER_ORG = #{createUserOrg},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate},
MODIFY_USER = #{modifyUser},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew},
EXT_DATE1 = #{extDate1},
EXT_DATE2 = #{extDate2},
EXT_NUM1 = #{extNum1},
EXT_NUM2 = #{extNum2},
EXT_NUM3 = #{extNum3},
EXT_STR1 = #{extStr1},
EXT_STR2 = #{extStr2},
EXT_STR3 = #{extStr3},
EXT_STR4 = #{extStr4},
EXT_STR5 = #{extStr5},
MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDateNew} where ID = #{id} and MODIFY_DATE = #{modifyDate}
